content:
Naomi lives at $2^{\text{nd}}$ Avenue and $3^{\text{rd}}$ Street, represented by the point $(2,3)$ on the map below.  Her school is located at $4^{\text{th}}$ Avenue and $10^{\text{th}}$ Street, represented by $(4, 10)$ on the map.  To get to school, she walks over to $4^{\text{th}}$ Avenue and up to $10^{\text{th}}$ Street.

**Plot Naomi's house and her school on the map.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]

**How far does Naomi walk to get to school?**  
[[☃ input-number 1]] blocks
